message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $11,000. Let me know if that works for you.
